title: What Rosie O’Donnell Really Said She’d Like to Do with Her Period Blood
subtitle: Comedian Rosie O'Donnell stands accused of saying 'I'd like to take my period blood and smear it all over Christians' faces' -- but it's not an accurate quote.
author: David Emery
vclaim: During a radio interview, Rosie O'Donnell said, "I'd like to take my period blood and smear it all over Christians' [or pro-life people's] faces."
